content: Hi! My name is Daniel and I'm an electrical engineer by trade, but I mostly work on embedded software. I'm currently learning Rust by rewriting the firmware of a custom device I've built in the past few years, and I'm interested in occasionally picking up smaller issues regarding rustc.

I'm interested in occasionally picking up smaller issues regarding rustc.

Can help you with that. When you need an issue to work on, you can send me a private message here :smile:
